price: Your Lord knows all that their hearts conceal and all that they reveal.
arabic: وَرَبُّكَ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمۡ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
